caption: Discovery
description: The Discovery event is a generic event that defines a set of attributes available in Discovery category events. As a generic event, it could be used to log events that are not otherwise defined by the Discovery specific event classes. Note: this event class should not be used a final solution. This generic event class should only be used temporarily until time can be spent mapping to a specific event class.
name: discovery

1.caption: Log
1.description: The discovered information is via a log.

2.caption: Collect
2.description: The discovered information is via a collection process.
